name: Shields
description: Grants 1 Shield point to your active character. (Can stack, no stack limit)
descriptionraw: Grants <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 $[K6] point</color> to your active character. (Can stack, no stack limit)
descriptionreplaced: Grants <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> point</color> to your active character. (Can stack, no stack limit)
